name: Start With a Jab
description:
Start With a Jab was my final project while attending Goldsmiths University of London, during my 'Independent Games and Playable Experience Design' MA.

I was trying to build a game where the player experienced taking a boxing lesson while blind. It ended up being more of an interactive fiction game, with a lot of the active elements stripped out due to time constraints.

I'd like to try fleshing this game out at a future date!
